name: Pencil Meadows
description:
This is for the Scribble Jam - hosted by Joey Staps.

It only took a few days for me to make this, so it may not be too interesting: it only has 5 levels and a challenge at the end in order to win the game!

This is my 2nd time developing a finished game on Godot.

Controls:

Left arrow - Move left

Right arrow - move right

Mouse - Interacting with buttons

Note: The name is the game IS NOT Pencil Meadows. That is just a code for the actual name of the game because of the limitations of the jam: "CHALLENGE: [ What did you say? ]: All text in your game must be a made up language." So, I decided to use pictures to explain objectives in the game. If you can guess the name of the game, then you will a prize- actually, everyone will get a prize for trying.

Another note:

After completing the levels, you have to CLICK on THE TROPHY to win. (Make sure to click it at "the right time"; otherwise, you will fail the game. 😈😈😈)

Don't worry; you will know when you failed. Heh heh heh.
